body_html:
@bddppq Agreed. I removed quite a few of the things that may not be necessary. Current changes on my laptop with local cmake gives me this:

before change, 2nd run of cmake: 8.911s
after change, 2nd run of cmake: 8.046s

So the clean ones are probably worth committing.

body:
@bddppq Agreed. I removed quite a few of the things that may not be necessary. Current changes on my laptop with local cmake gives me this:

before change, 2nd run of cmake: 8.911s
after change, 2nd run of cmake: 8.046s

So the clean ones are probably worth committing.
